Returns: true if the directory entry should be accepted
Parameters: T: the directory entry to be tested
accept(T).Description: Decides if the given directory entry should be accepted or filtered.

ClassDesc: An interface that is implemented by objects that decide if a directory entry should be accepted or filtered. A Filter is passed as the parameter to the @B_java#nio#file#Files#newDirectoryStream_E@ method when opening a directory to iterate over the entries in the directory.
